message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90%, you get 10%. We can adjust in the next round if you think it's unfair.
You started with a high offer, so I'm countering with a more modest one. Your turn to decide!
I'm willing to compromise, but I think 70/30 is a fairer split given the inflation.
I'm not convinced 70/30 is fair. I'll meet you in the middle with a 50/50 split. Your turn to decide!
